sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A notable and learned sermon or homilie, made vpon saint Andrewes daye last past 1556 in the Cathedral curche of S. Paule in London, by Mayster Ihon Harpesfeild doctour of diuinitie and canon residenciary of the sayd churche, set furthe by the bishop of London. Harpsfield, John, 1516-1578.
[40] p.
By Robert Caly, within the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye freers, nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes Hospitall], [Imprynted at London : Vltimo Decembris 1556.
Printer's name from colophon. At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library. Signatures: A-B C⁴(-C4).
=======
A notable and learned sermon or homilie, made vpon saint Andrewes daye last past 1556 in the Cathedral curche of S. Paule in London, by Mayster Ihon Harpesfeild doctour of diuinitie and canon residenciary of the sayd churche, set furthe by the bishop of London. Harpsfield, John, 1516-1578.
[40] p.
By Robert Caly, within the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye freers, nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes Hospitall], [Imprynted at London : Vltimo Decembris 1556.
Printer's name from colophon. At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library. Signatures: A-B C⁴(-C4).
Robert Caly
the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye freers, nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes Hospitall]
>>>>>>> imprintparse
